title: Mi 4C 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV - 1U, Remote Control - 1U, Manual & Warranty Card - 1U, Stands - 2U, Screws – 4U
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, News, Movie, Game, Custom, 5 Band Equalizer
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus Hotstar, Help, Sensy TV Guide, YouTube, Google Play Movies, Google Play Music, Google Play Store
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Double Tap Volume Down Button to Mute, Long Press Mi Button for Quick Settings
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 2 Years on Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Physical Damages After Usage, Scratches on Panel will Not Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for Greater than 32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Bright Full HD Display: Thanks to its Full HD display, the Mi Smart TV delivers clear pictures and enhances your viewing experience. With an improved brightness, rich colours, and contrast, this TV displays the content as intended by the creators.
product_description.DTS-HD Audio and Stereo Speakers: Built with DTS-HD audio and stereo speakers, this TV delivers high-quality HD sound. So, whether you’re listening to your favourite tunes or watching live sports, movies, or shows, this TV delivers an engrossing audio experience.

Nice android tv. Value for money, picture, sound all good at this price range. The main feature is android tv u can easily access ur tv like ur mobile, casting is good n also worked in iphone

Before i say anything , just one thing i would say, go for it.. its an absolute value for money buy, spec wise, it has got all the specs and feature plus more which a family tv needs, pure android experience and with patchwall it makes gets better, amazing picture and amazing sound. App store support, p.s you can add device like key board ans laptop via usb/HDMI cable, use it as big screen , only thing I would say dont use with a copper wire cable it will not do the justice with this tv. Use dish or internet based service , remote is amazing but i felt it could have been more snappy, you can play games from google play app and either u play online or dowload it, playing online is a better option..all in all its a must buy..

A:India�s first Smart TV to be integrated with ratings from IMDb for movies and TV Shows which helps you decide what to watch in an instant. Discover top rated movies, shows right from the home screen.
A:With Universal search now users can search across 23+ content partners and find their favourite movie, series, or content itself.
A:Pre-set Sound Modes: Game, News, Movie and Standard. Users can also customize the audio parameters under custom. Pre-set Video modes: Vivid, Standard, Movie, Picture, and Sports.
A:With Universal Search, users can search across 30 content partners and find their favourite movies, TV shows and other media content on PatchWall.
A:Mi TV 4C 43 comes with Google�s Play Store. You can find TV apps in the play store. These apps are specially made for TV.
A:With Mi Quick Wake you can quickly wake your TV in just 5 seconds. Tap the power button once to turn off your TV, tap again to quickly wake the TV.
A:Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Media player, Settings, Gallery, TV Manager, Sensy TV Guide, YouTube, Play Movies, Play Music, Play Store, LIVE TV.
A:The Vivid Picture Engine (VPE) is our in-house image processing tech which delivers exceptional colours, significant depth, and deeper contrasts on our TV panels.
A:Yes, all our Mi TVs have Chromecast built-in. You can also mirror your screen by using Google Home App.
